lyrics:
37 ContributorsTranslationsPolskiMisguided Ghosts Lyrics[Intro]

[Verse 1]

[Chorus]

[Verse 2]
Now I'm told that this is life
And pain is just a simple compromise

And run to them, to them
Full speed ahead
Oh, you are not useless
We are just

[Chorus]

Traveling endlessly

Pushed us far away
And there's no one road
We should not be the same

And still they echo me
They echo me in circles22Embed
